original_text: Howbeit he refused to turn aside: wherefore Abner with the hinder end of the spear smote him under the fifth rib, that the spear came out behind him; and he fell down there, and died in the same place: and it came to pass, that as many as came to the place where Asahel fell down and died stood still.
korean_text: 그가 물러가기를 거절하매 아브넬이 창 뒤 끝으로 그의 배를 찌르니 창이 그의 등을 꿰뚫고 나간지라 곧 그 곳에 엎드러져 죽으매 아사헬이 엎드러져 죽은 곳에 이르는 자마다 머물러 섰더라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit he refused to turn aside:
wherefore Abner with the hinder end of the spear smote him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 아브넬이 창의 뒷끝으로 그를 치니

sentences.original_text: that the spear came out behind him;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 창이 그의 등 뒤로 나왔으며

sentences.original_text: and died in the same place:
that as many as came to the place where Asahel fell down
sentences.korean_translation: 아사엘이 쓰러진 그 곳에 온 모든 사람들이
죽은 그 곳에 우뚝 서 있었다.
